abstractText: Following publication of the original article [1], we have been notified that the corresponding author name was published incorrectly. It was Zuhair Al Hassnan and it should be as follows: Zuhair Al-Hassnan Reference 1. Al‐Hassnan Z, Hashmi NA, Makhseed N, et al. Expert Group Consensus on early diagnosis and management of infantile‐onset pompe disease in the Gulf Region. Orphanet J Rare Dis. 2022;17:388. https:// doi. org/ 10. 1186/ s13023‐ 022‐ 02545‐w.

sections.text:
Al‑Hassnan et al. Orphanet Journal of Rare Diseases (2023) 18:365 https://doi.org/10.1186/s13023‑023‑02967‑0
CORRECTION

sections.heading: Correction: Expert Group Consensus on early
sections.text:
diagnosis and management of infantile‑onset pompe disease in the Gulf Region Zuhair Al‑Hassnan1* , Nadia Al Hashmi2, Nawal Makhseed3, Tawfeg Ben Omran4,5, Fatma Al Jasmi6,7 and Amal Al Teneiji8
Correction: Orphanet Journal of Rare Diseases (2022) 17:388 https://doi.org/10.1186/s13023-022-02545-w
Following publication of the original article [1], we have been notified that the corresponding author name was published incorrectly. It was Zuhair Al Hassnan and it should be as follows:
Zuhair Al-Hassnan
Reference 1. Al‑Hassnan Z, Hashmi NA, Makhseed N, et al. Expert Group Consensus on
early diagnosis and management of infantile‑onset pompe disease in the Gulf Region. Orphanet J Rare Dis. 2022;17:388. https:// doi. org/ 10. 1186/ s13023‑ 022‑ 02545‑w.

title: Correction: Expert Group Consensus on early diagnosis and management of infantile-onset pompe disease in the Gulf Region
